==Abilities and Attacks==
''Attack names are unofficial.''

* '''Stab''': Performs a quick stab with their spear, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
* '''Spear Combo''': Performs 3 stab combo with their spear, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} with each stab.
* '''Dodge''': Jumps backwards away from the player.
* '''Rally''': The Millelith Sergeant rallies nearby Millelith Soldiers, causing them to perform 3-stab combo.
